replies.body:
So what, that's one guy out of the maybe thousand donators (random guess) 
I'm not saying he's the only one, but lets just say that there's a 0.1% chance of a donator hacking, so small that I wouldn't even bother claiming that someone was, and even if they are, you don't call out in chat and tell them that you are on to them, you join observers and record them before they realise that they've just thrown away the money that they spent on their donation rank.
